attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are members of the dengie lva
we are disapointed that 4p was put on a pint of beer
on shopping in tescos today
they have a easter special £6.50
for 18 cans of beer
where is there 4p rise
we campaign against supermarkets selling alcohol unsupervised
but that doesnt matter
because mummy and daddy buy the teenagers cases of beer and smirnoff ice to drink in there home, parks or even on the streets
sorry to be a boor
but people can no longer afford to drink in pubs
is this our fault no it is
the goverments fault
no need to say more than that

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
